title: Clinical Practice Competency Enhancement: Gamification-Infused Instructional Design for Health Promotion in Pediatric Cancer Patients

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational healthcare knowledge and elementary education experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design health management strategies for pediatric cancer patients across treatment phases as game-based activities.
Learners can propose at least three methods for psychological and social support for pediatric patients by applying gamification elements.
Learners can create educational materials using board game templates (digital/printable) in non-real-time online environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
